ssGUI::​Backend::​BackendFontSFML

For functions explainations, please see BackendFontInterface. Normally you don't need to deal with this class

private:

    bool SFFontValid;   //See <IsValid>

                                        SFFontValid(false)
{
}

) override

See BackendFontInterface::LoadFromPath SFML supports: TrueType, Type 1, CFF, OpenType, SFNT, X11 PCF, Windows FNT, BDF, PFR and Type 42

GetFixedAvailableFontSizes
bool GetFixedAvailableFontSizes(
std::vector<float>& fontSizes
) override

SFML doesn't support this, calling this function will have no effect.
